ai.level1.instrumental.description: Second difficulty level name, instrumental case

ai.level2.instrumental.description: Third difficulty level name, instrumental case

ai.level3.instrumental.description: Fourth difficulty level name, instrumental case

Win

unlock.continentalLeague.message:
Win
all continental cups

legendUnlock.message:
Win

legendUnlocked.message:
Congratulations!
You have unlocked an additional difficulty level: Legend

hint.0.message: For a ground pass press , for a lob pass press .

hint.1.message: To switch between players press .

hint.2.message: The longer you press the lob pass the longer it goes.

hint.3.message: Retrieve the ball from opponent with a sliding tackle using .

hint.4.message: Hold to run faster - works without the ball only.

hint.5.message: Use to shoot directly, with first touch, precisely or with an air ball.

hint.6.message: Run on the ball holding the button to shoot the ball with the player's first touch.

hint.7.message: For an air shoot, run underneath the falling ball while holding .

hint.8.message: Hold to shoot precisely - aim and curve the ball.

hint.9.message: To curve the ball using the precise shot hold or .

hint.10.message: Super-move is a bonus given to a team once in a while. Push to use it.

hint.11.message: Magnet Super-move pulls the ball to your player.

hint.12.message: Teleport Super-move moves your player (with the ball) to another, pointed place on the pitch.

hint.13.message: Super-shot Super-move lets you control the ball, but avoid opponent's players.

hint.14.message: Windmaker Super-move defends you from shots on your goal (only if it hasn't been triggered too late).

hint.15.message: Freeze Super-move freezes players (including your team-mates) near you for a certain time.

hint.16.message: Tesla-copter Super-move follows the player with the ball, electrocuting others after pressing .

hint.17.message: The better you play, the more Super-moves you get during the match.

hint.18.message: Some of the Super-moves can be used to neutralize opponent's Super-moves.

hint.19.message: Make a sliding tackle with your goalkeeper by pressing .

hint.20.message: You switch the active player by pressing and by holding stick or keyboard arrows in a direction of a team-mate to switch to.

hint.21.message: The goalkeeper is resistant to sliding tackles, but he can't move with the ball.

hint.22.message: To run faster while having the ball, push the ball forward by pressing and sprint to it by holding .

hint.23.message: Played games give you Fame Points thanks to which you advance in the rankings.

hint.24.message: Tournaments can also be played with your friends on the same team.

hint.25.message: Completing challenge of the tournament match gives you Fame Points.

table.goalsFor.description: Short form of the words 'Goals For'

table.goalsAgainst.description: Short form of the words 'Goals Against'

menu.back.description: Button label for returning to the previous screen

menu.next.description: Button label for going to the next screen

menu.resetMessage.message: Are you sure you want to reset to defaults?

menu.saveMessage.message: Are you sure you want to save these settings?

menu.quitMessage.message: Are you sure you want to quit?

menu.quit.description: Button label for abandoning current game

menu.save.description: Button label for saving some options.

friendly.drawsOn.description: When a draw is allowed in a match.

friendly.drawsOff.description: When a draw is not allowed in a match.

help.content.description: Reference to an external file, please copy source string

gameplay.replays.description: Option to automatically show replays during match after scoring a goal.

gameplay.celebration.description: Option to automatically show celebration after scoring a goal.

gameplay.aiIndicators.description: Option to show AI indicators (circles beneath players).

gameplay.showUsernames.description: Option to show usernames above players.

controls.duplicated.message: It seems that the same keys are assigned to different actions, you need to correct this before saving.

controls.reset.message: Due to changes in the game, keyboard and gamepad layouts needed to be reset. If you've customized your controls, you need to do that again, sorry!

actions.up.description: Name of action for moving in-game character up.

actions.down.description: Name of action for moving in-game character down.

actions.left.description: Name of action for moving in-game character left.

actions.right.description: Name of action for moving in-game character right.

actions.up2.description: Name of action for moving in-game character up.

actions.down2.description: Name of action for moving in-game character down.

actions.left2.description: Name of action for moving in-game character left.

actions.right2.description: Name of action for moving in-game character right.

actions.passModifier.description: Name of action for changing between pass modes.

actions.sprint.description: Name of action for running faster.

actions.slide.description: Name of action for performing slide tackle.

actions.goalkeeperSlide.description: Name of action for performing goalkeeper slide tackle.

actions.togglePlayer.description: Name of action for changing in-game characters.

actions.toggleTeam.description: Name of action for enabling or disabling a controller (keyboard, gamepad).

actions.pass.description: Name of action for passing the ball to another player.

actions.lob.description: Name of action for passing the ball to another player by kicking in the ball in the air.

actions.shoot.description: Name of action for shooting at the goal.

actions.header.description: Name of action headers and bicycle kicks.

actions.swerveUp.description: Name of action for swerving the ball in one direction.

actions.swerveDown.description: Name of action for swerving the ball in another direction.

actions.supermove.description: Name of action for activating a super-move (special action in game).

actions.pause.description: Name of action for pausing the game.

actions.menuAltLeft.description: Name of action for alternative scrolling.

actions.menuAltRight.description: Name of action for alternative scrolling.

actions.menuClearAssigment.description: Name of action for clearing key assigments.

actions.menuBack.description: Name of action for canceling menu choice.

actions.menuAccept.description: Name of action for accepting menu choice.

pause.back.description: Button label for abandoning match and returning to menu.

pause.forfeit.description: Button label for forfeiting a multiplayer match.

pause.showChallenge.description: Button label for showing challenge description.

tournament.lose.message:
You've lost the tournament!
Better luck next time.
You have gained {FAME} fame points.

tournament.custom.eliminations.title.description: Custom tournament eliminations type screen heading.

tournament.custom.eliminationsWithGroups.description: Custom tournament eliminations with group stage type screen heading.

tournament.tableLegend.message: P = Points W = Wins D = Draws L = Loses F = Goals For A = Goals Against

multiplayer.quickMatch.info.message: Play a quick match against players around the world

multiplayer.host.info.message: Customize a game and invite other players

multiplayer.hostDisconnected.message: Connection with the host of the game was lost.

multiplayer.gameList.join.error.message: An error occured, please try a different game.

multiplayer.invite.alert.message.message: User {USERNAME} has invited you to play Kopanito

multiplayer.invite.confirm.message.message:
User {USERNAME} has invited you to play Kopanito.

multiplayer.matchmaking.assetError.message: You don't have required teams, stadiums or balls to start this game.

challenges.goalDifference.message: Win by scoring {MIN_DIFFERENCE} goals more than your opponent

challenges.cleanSheet.message: Do not concede a single goal in a match

challenges.dribbleTime.message: Dribble for {MIN_DRIBBLE_TIME} seconds without losing the ball in a match

challenges.dribbleDistance.message: Dribble for {MIN_DRIBBLE_DISTANCE} meters without losing the ball in a match

challenges.noSlideTackle.message: Win without using slide tackle (neither field player nor goalkeeper)

challenges.noPreciseShot.message: Win without using a precise shot

challenges.scoringDefenderName.message: The Best Defense Is A Good Offense

challenges.scoringDefender.message: Score a goal with one of your defenders

challenges.everyoneScores.message: Have every one of your field players score a goal in a match

challenges.golzagol.message: Score a goal in less than {MIN_TIME} seconds after conceding a goal

challenges.fastTriple.message: Score 3 goals in less than {MIN_TIME} seconds

challenges.consecutiveSlides.message: Perform {MIN_SLIDES} successful slides in a row

challenges.slideTrap.message: Perform {MIN_SLIDES} clean slide tackles in a match

challenges.doubleSlideHit.message: Hit 2 opponents with a single slide tackle

challenges.goalkeeperSlideTrap.message: Perform {MIN_SLIDES} successfull slide tackles with your goalkeeper in a match

challenges.slideIntercept.message: Intercept {MIN_INTERCEPTIONS} passes using a slide tackle in a match

challenges.trap.message: Trap the ball {MIN_TRAPS} times without using a slide tackle in a match

challenges.slideScore.message: Score a goal by sliding through goal line

challenges.roundingTheKeeper.message: Score a goal by dribbling past the goal line with the ball

challenges.maxBallSwerve.message: Score {MIN_GOALS} goals by using extremely swerved shots in a match

challenges.teleportScore.message: Score a goal using the teleport super-move

challenges.magnetOnSupershot.message: Cancel a super-shot using the ball magnet

challenges.magnetOnShot.message: Cancel a shot using the ball magnet

challenges.touchWoodwork.message: Score {MIN_GOALS} goals by hitting the goal posts or crossbar in a match

challenges.penaltyAreaScore.message: Score {MIN_GOALS} from the opponent's penalty area in a match

challenges.pitchAreaScore.message: Score {MIN_GOALS} from outside of the opponent's penalty area in a match

challenges.cornerScore.message: Score {MIN_GOALS} from a corner kick in a match

challenges.goalkeeperLob.message: Score a goal by lobbing the ball over the goalkeeper

challenges.supershotHitAndScore.message: Hit 2 opponents with a super-shot and score a goal

challenges.teleportKnockDown.message: Knock-down an opponent using a teleport

challenges.cornerDefense.message: Do not concede a goal from a corner kick in a match

challenges.untouchableGoal.message: Score a goal without losing the ball (starting with your goalkeeper or from a kick-off)

challenges.windmakerSave.message: Prevent a goal by activating the windmaker at the last moment

challenges.reverseShot.message: Score a goal with a precise shot while running in the opposite direction to the opponent's goal

challenges.cleanPasses.message: Make {MIN_PASSES} consecutive passes without losing possession in a match

challenges.cleanLobs.message: Make {MIN_PASSES} consecutive lobs without losing possession in a match

challenges.cleanGroundPasses.message: Make {MIN_PASSES} consecutive ground passes without losing possession in a match

challenges.supershotFromPenaltyArea.message: Score a goal from a super-shot launched from your own penalty area

challenges.avoidGoalkeeper.message: Avoid 2 goalkeeper slide tackles in a row

challenges.noBallSlideTackle.message: Slide tackle {OPPONENTS} opponents without the ball in a match

achievements.goldenGoal.message: Win a match by a golden goal

achievements.friendlyFire.message: Hit or slide tackle a teammate

achievements.localMulti.message: Play a match with 3 or more friends

achievements.localMultiCup.message: Play a tournament match with a friend

achievements.slideTackle.message: Hit {MIN_HITS} opponents with a slide tackle

achievements.firstSecondsGoal.message: Score a goal in the first seconds of a match

achievements.lastSecondsGoal.message: Score a goal in the last seconds of a match

achievements.cleanEvent.message: Don't concede a single goal in a cup or league

achievements.silverLeague.message: Reach the Silver League / Gain {FAME} fame

achievements.goldLeague.message: Reach the Gold League / Gain {FAME} fame

achievements.platinumLeague.message: Reach the Platinum League / Gain {FAME} fame

achievements.magnet.message: Steal the ball {MIN_STEALS} times using the ball magnet

achievements.supershot.message: Score {MIN_GOALS, plural, one {# goal} other {# goals}} with a super-shot

achievements.supermovesMaster.message: Use 4 different super-moves in a match

achievements.topScorer.message: Score {MIN_GOALS, plural, one {# goal} other {# goals}}

achievements.completeMainEvents.message: Complete all main events (continental + world cup) on any difficulty level

achievements.completeOptionalEvents.message: Complete all optional events (minor cups and leagues) on any difficulty level

achievements.legendMasteredSuccess.message:
Congratulations!
You have completed all available competitions on the highest difficulty level!

leagues.promotion.message:
Congratulations!
You have been promoted to the {LEAGUE_NAME}!

leagues.relegation.message:
Sorry!
You have been relegated to the {LEAGUE_NAME}.

leagues.intro.message:
You've got {FAME} fame points!

Win friendly matches, tournaments and complete challenges to earn more points. Higher AI difficulty gives more points.

You need {MIN_FAME} fame points to advance to the Bronze League.

leagues.table.league.description: Initial from the word `League` used in the leaderboard tables.

GIF generation completed.
